testimonials.title: Loved by Writers Everywhere
testimonials.subtitle: See what our users have to say about their experience with WriteAI.

sarah.text: This AI writing assistant has transformed how our team creates content. The SEO suggestions are incredibly accurate.
sarah.name: Sarah Chen
sarah.title: Content Manager at TechCorp

marcus.text: The grammar checker caught issues I completely missed. It's like having a professional editor available 24/7.
marcus.name: Marcus Johnson
marcus.title: Freelance Writer at Independent

emily.text: Our content quality has improved dramatically. The AI suggestions help us maintain consistency across all our writing.
emily.name: Emily Rodriguez
emily.title: Marketing Director at StartupXYZ
